outputs.output_descr:
This project document covers the preparation and dissemination of the NHDR of the Gambia for 2012 on the theme Youth Employment in The Gambia. 
Human development is about people expanding their choices to live full, creative lives free from fear and indignity. Fundamental to expanding human choices is building capabilities through investment in people and using those human capabilities fully in an enabling environment for growth and employment.
This report would serve as a reference document to global and national development policy debate.

project_title: National Human Development Report of The Gambia
